name: Shield and Staff
description:
Olive and Boulder form their odd partnership when a mysterious alchemist calls upon them to fix his mistake; Unleashing a host of skeletons upon the kingdom! It is up to Olive and Boulder to clean up the mess that the alchemist created.

Shield and Staff is a co-op cutesy puzzle adventure game where one player is wields a shield and another player wields a staff. The two players must work together to solve puzzles and defeat enemies.

As of right now the game requires two controllers (another person is highly recommended).

Please join us while we create a game we want to play (and hopefully you do too).

Shield and Staff Twitter: https://twitter.com/ShieldandStaff
